input.sentences: my husband and i decided to have a cookout in her honor .
we grilled up a storm -- -burgers | chicken corn -- -the whole works .
we both love his grilled corn . we cracked up eating it together !
output.sentences: The female then meets a man and smiles at him.
There are hot dogs and hamburgers on the grill.
I am making them for my girl.
And finally we can enjoy and eat them together.
